verses.verse: Let a man <S%G444><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> account <S%G3049><s%> of us, <S%G2248><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> of the ministers <S%G5257><s%> of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> stewards <S%G3623><s%> of the mysteries <S%G3466><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> Moreover <S%G3063><s%> <S%G3739><s%> it is required <S%G2212><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> stewards, <S%G3623><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> a man <S%G5100><s%> be found <S%G2147><s%> faithful. <S%G4103><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> with me <S%G1698><s%> it is <S%G2076><s%> a <S%G1519><s%> very small thing <S%G1646><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> I should be judged <S%G350><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> you, <S%G5216><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> man's <S%G442><s%> judgment: <S%G2250><s%> yea, <S%G235><s%> I judge <S%G350><s%> not <S%G3761><s%> mine own self. <S%G1683><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> I know <S%G4894><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> by myself; <S%G1683><s%> yet <S%G235><s%> am I not <S%G3756><s%> hereby <S%G1722><s%> <S%G5129><s%> justified: <S%G1344><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> he that judgeth <S%G350><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

Therefore <S%G5620><s%> judge <S%G2919><s%> nothing <S%G5100><s%> <S%G3361><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> the time, <S%G2540><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> <S%G302><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> come, <S%G2064><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> will bring to light <S%G5461><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> hidden things <S%G2927><s%> of darkness, <S%G4655><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> will make manifest <S%G5319><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> counsels <S%G1012><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> hearts: <S%G2588><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> shall every man <S%G1538><s%> have <S%G1096><s%> praise <S%G1868><s%> of <S%G575><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> these things, <S%G5023><s%> brethren, <S%G80><s%> I have in a figure transferred <S%G3345><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> myself <S%G1683><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to Apollos <S%G625><s%> for your sakes; <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5209><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> ye might learn <S%G3129><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> us <S%G2254><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> to think <S%G5426><s%> of men above <S%G5228><s%> that which <S%G3739><s%> is written, <S%G1125><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of you be puffed up <S%G5448><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> another. <S%G2087><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> maketh thee to differ <S%G1252><s%> <S%G4571><s%> from another? and <S%G1161><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> hast <S%G2192><s%> thou that <S%G3739><s%> thou didst not <S%G3756><s%> receive? <S%G2983><s%> now <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> thou didst <S%G2532><s%> receive <S%G2983><s%> it, why <S%G5101><s%> dost thou glory, <S%G2744><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> thou hadst not <S%G3361><s%> received <S%G2983><s%> it?

Now <S%G2235><s%> ye are <S%G2075><s%> full, <S%G2880><s%> now <S%G2235><s%> ye are rich, <S%G4147><s%> ye have reigned as kings <S%G936><s%> without <S%G5565><s%> us: <S%G2257><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> I would to God <S%G3785><s%> <S%G1065><s%> ye did reign, <S%G936><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> might reign with <S%G4821><s%> you. <S%G5213><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> I think <S%G1380><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> hath set forth <S%G584><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> apostles <S%G652><s%> last, <S%G2078><s%> as it were <S%G5613><s%> appointed to death: <S%G1935><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> we are made <S%G1096><s%> a spectacle <S%G2302><s%> unto the <S%G3588><s%> world, <S%G2889><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to angels, <S%G32><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to men. <S%G444><s%>

We <S%G2249><s%> are fools <S%G3474><s%> for Christ's sake, <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5547><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> are wise <S%G5429><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ; <S%G5547><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> are weak, <S%G772><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> are strong; <S%G2478><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> are honorable, <S%G1741><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> are despised. <S%G820><s%>

Even unto <S%G891><s%> this present <S%G737><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%> we both <S%G2532><s%> hunger, <S%G3983><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> thirst, <S%G1372><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> are naked, <S%G1130><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> are buffeted, <S%G2852><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> have no certain dwelling place; <S%G790><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> labor, <S%G2872><s%> working <S%G2038><s%> with our own <S%G2398><s%> hands: <S%G5495><s%> being reviled, <S%G3058><s%> we bless; <S%G2127><s%> being persecuted, <S%G1377><s%> we suffer <S%G430><s%> it:

Being defamed, <S%G987><s%> we entreat: <S%G3870><s%> we are made <S%G1096><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> the filth <S%G4027><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> world, <S%G2889><s%> and are the offscouring <S%G4067><s%> of all things <S%G3956><s%> unto <S%G2193><s%> this day. <S%G737><s%>

I write <S%G1125><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> to shame <S%G1788><s%> you, <S%G5209><s%> but <S%G235><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> beloved <S%G27><s%> sons <S%G5043><s%> I warn <S%G3560><s%> you.

For <S%G1063><s%> though <S%G1437><s%> ye have <S%G2192><s%> ten thousand <S%G3463><s%> instructors <S%G3807><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> yet <S%G235><s%> have ye not <S%G3756><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> fathers: <S%G3962><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> have begotten <S%G1080><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> gospel. <S%G2098><s%>
Wherefore <S%G3767><s%> I beseech <S%G3870><s%> you, <S%G5209><s%> be <S%G1096><s%> ye followers <S%G3402><s%> of me. <S%G3450><s%>

For this cause <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> have I sent <S%G3992><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> Timothy, <S%G5095><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> beloved <S%G27><s%> son, <S%G5043><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> shall bring you into remembrance <S%G363><s%> <S%G5209><s%> of my <S%G3450><s%> ways <S%G3598><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> be in <S%G1722><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> I teach <S%G1321><s%> every where <S%G3837><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> church. <S%G1577><s%>
Now <S%G1161><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> are puffed up, <S%G5448><s%> as though <S%G5613><s%> I <S%G3450><s%> would not <S%G3361><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> you. <S%G5209><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> I will come <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> shortly, <S%G5030><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> will, <S%G2309><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> will know, <S%G1097><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> speech <S%G3056><s%> of them which are puffed up, <S%G5448><s%> but <S%G235><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> power. <S%G1411><s%>
For <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is not <S%G3756><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> word, <S%G3056><s%> but <S%G235><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> power. <S%G1411><s%>

What <S%G5101><s%> will <S%G2309><s%> ye? shall I come <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> a rod, <S%G4464><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> love, <S%G26><s%> and <S%G5037><s%> in the spirit <S%G4151><s%> of meekness? <S%G4236><s%>
